The '2010 [[Los Angeles Dodgers]] season' saw the team failing to defend their
back-to-back National League West titles as they played their 53rd season in
Southern California, since moving from Brooklyn after the 1957 season.
categories: 2010 Major League Baseball season|Los Angeles Dodgers season
